title: Oven chips
description: Eating healthily doesn’t mean you have to cut out your favourite dishes. By cooking these chips in the oven you dramatically reduce the amount of oil used. Vary the taste with your own choice of herbs and spices.This dish provides 249 kcal, 4.5g protein, 51g carbohydrate (of which 9g sugars), 3.5g fat (of which 0.5g saturates), 7g fibre and 0.2g salt per portion.
ingredients: 1-2 large Maris Piper or King Edward potatoes, scrubbed
